value:
$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Gullveig...$k$p$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No, this can't be...$k$pKvasir will eventually become...me.$k$pAnd I...become...you.$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I-it's not possible! I refuse to become
a killer like you! I won't!$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|I said the same thing.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I... I won't!$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|Seiðr, the past is Kvasir's time.
There is no place for you here.$k$pGo back to the time you call
your own.$k$pYou must yet taste all I have known...$k$p$Sbs3000|$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Huh? Wh-where are we?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We traveled back to our own time,
or rather...we were sent back.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Something feels off.$k$p$WmMEID_ヘイズ敵,ch00_49_Heith_F_Enemy00,Face_Pain|Seið...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Heiðr!$k$p$WmMEID_ヘイズ敵,ch00_49_Heith_F_Enemy00,Face_Pain|I'm so sorry, Seið...$k$pTh-the serpents...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The curse is overwhelming her...$k$pWhy...why is this happening now?!
Hold on, Heið!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Wait! Be careful. We don't know what
might happen with her condition...$k$p$WmMEID_ヘイズ敵,ch00_49_Heith_F_Enemy00,Face_Pain2|Th-the serpents...$k$pHrk! ...Nyaaagghhhh!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|She's trying to run away from us...
Should we follow her?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|She's lost control. She's not acting
of her own free will anymore.$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|The transformation is likely beyond
our power to stop now.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What's happening to her,
King Njörðr?$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I poured my light into her in an
attempt at controlling the curse, but...$k$p$EFace_Pain2|The strength of the seer's curse
has grown outside even my ability.
There is no way for us to stop it.$k$p$EFace_Normal2|Seiðr... There is only one thing
to be done now.$k$pRelease Heiðr from her torment.
Grant her this mercy.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I... I...$k$p$Sbs150|
